item.title: Zelda sword (really cool MUST SEE)
item.dc:creator: @xldarkwinglx xldarkwinglx
item.description:
@xldarkwinglx wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:5, topic:355685”][quote author=xldarkwinglx link=topic=452238.msg3314419#msg3314419 date=1282196495]
It doesn’t look awful but it could use some more textures like shading. But it looks ok. Don’t listen to the guys who told you it was 100% awful.

4/5 (add more textures to it! That should make it look cooler)
[/quote]It’s called constructive criticism, and when you’ve been making models as long as I have, you know whats good and what isn’t.[/quote]
Well I don’t make models but I think he could go somewhere with it and make it really cool.

Read full topic

item.title: Zelda sword (really cool MUST SEE)
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

It looks like you traced the blade and hilt, but used a primitive sphere and cylinder. Not gonna lie, it looks awful.

The polygon flow of the blade is horrible, make it flow nicer and be more even. Make the entire thing symmetrical for that matter. Also, the handle and pummel shouldn’t be that big, they should be a LOT smaller and purple. You could also probably make the sword with a lot less faces too.

Read full topic
